Datangi Kantor Wapres, Apindo Ingin Ma'ruf Amin Bisa Seperti JK
06 Nov 2019, 10:23 by Egi Adyatama, Kodrat Setiawan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Para pengurus Asosiasi Pengusaha Indonesia (Apindo) menyambangi Kantor Wakil Presiden Ma'ruf Amin di Jalan Medan Merdeka Utara, Jakarta Pusat, Rabu, 6 November 2019. Dalam kesempatan itu, pengurus Apindo berharap agar Ma'ruf bisa ikut mendorong pertumbuhan ekonomi seperti Wapres sebelumnya, Jusuf Kalla.
"Kerja sama kita dengan Kantor Wapres akan tetap berjalan, sebaik waktu Pak JK. Pada waktu Pak JK itu koordinasi kami sangat baik, di mana saat kami menghadapi kesulitan," kata Ketua Umum Apindo Hariyadi Sukamdani saat ditemui usai pertemuan.
Pada era pemerintahan sebelumnya, Hariyadi mengatakan masih ada permasalahan komunikasi yang kurang lancar dengan kementerian, lembaga, hingga pemda. Namun saat itu, Hariyadi mengatakan Kantor Wapres di bawah JK selalu mampu membantu dan menyelesaikan masalah.
"Pada saat era Pak JK dapat dijembatani dengan baik oleh Kantor Wapres, diharapkan nanti kerja sama yang sudah sangat bagus ini dapat berjalan dengan baik ke depan," kata Hariyadi.
Selain itu, Apindo menyerahkan peta jalan (roadmap) langkah Apindo ke depan, kepada wapres. Hariyadi mengatakan roadmap ini disusun untuk membantu pemerintah memetakan masalah dan mencari solusinya.
Ia mengatakan roadmap itu mencakup semua sektor. Adapun yang membedakan roadmap ini dengan roadmap sebelumnya, adalah penyusunannya. Roadmap yang baru diberikan pada Ma'ruf, disusun oleh pengusaha sendiri. Sedangkan yang lama penyusunannya dibantu oleh ekonom.
"Semua lengkap di sini. Dibuat sistem secara matriks. Hampir mengcover semua problem kita, bahkan tak hanya memetakan masalah tapi juga mencari solusinya," kata Hariyadi.

Visiting the Vice President's Office, Apindo Wants Ma'ruf Amin to Be Like JK
06 Nov 2019, 10:23 by Egi Adyatama, Kodrat Setiawan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The management of the Indonesian Employers' Association (Apindo) visited the Office of Vice President Ma'ruf Amin on Jalan Medan Merdeka Utara, Central Jakarta, Wednesday, November 6, 2019. On that occasion, the Apindo management hoped that Ma'ruf could participate encourage economic growth like the previous Vice President, Jusuf Kalla.
"Our cooperation with the Vice President's Office will continue, as well as Mr. JK's time. At the time of Mr. JK our coordination was very good, where when we faced difficulties," Apindo Chairperson Hariyadi Sukamdani said after the meeting.
In the previous administration era, Hariyadi said there were still problems with substandard communication with ministries, institutions, and regional governments. But at that time, Hariyadi said that the Office of the Vice President under JK was always able to help and solve problems.
"At the time of the Pak JK era, it could be bridged well by the Office of the Vice President, it is hoped that this already very good cooperation will run well going forward," Hariyadi said.
In addition, Apindo handed over the road map for Apindo steps forward to the vice president. Hariyadi said the roadmap was prepared to help the government map the problem and find a solution.
He said the roadmap covered all sectors. As for what distinguishes this roadmap from the previous roadmap, is the preparation. The new roadmap given to Ma'ruf was prepared by the entrepreneurs themselves. While the old one is prepared by economists.
"Everything is complete here. The system was made in a matrix. Almost covered all our problems, not even mapping the problem but also looking for a solution," Hariyadi said.
